| HistoryText             = The Dora Milaje are the personal bodyguards of the [[Black Panther]]. They are extensively trained and highly skilled martial artists and with various weapons. The Midnight Angels are a subgroup of the [[Dora Milaje (Earth-616)|Dora Milaje]], a strike-force composed of the best of them.{{r|Doomwar #5}}

When [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Dr. Doom]] stole all the [[Vibranium|Wakandan Vibranium]], [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|T'Challa]] gathered the Midnights Angels as a support to [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]]'s mission: kill Doom.{{r|Doomwar #5}}

| Equipment               = Non-vibranium armors and stealth suits, [[Kimoyo Beads]]
| Transportation          = [[Dagger (Quinjet)|The Dagger]], a furtive [[Quinjet]]
| Weapons                 = Various non-vibranium weapons

| Notes                   = During their mission against Doom, their equipment were free of vibranium to avoid Doom's control.
